sentences: Parties continued deliberations on the draft COP decision.
Delegates discussed alternative textual proposals on whether, how or when to consider the outcomes of the workshop on the status of modeling activities and action on these outcomes.
SAUDI ARABIA supported discussing modeling in the context of economic diversification.
Parties then discussed options for text on impacts of response measures, and text on addressing and promoting economic diversification.
Delegates also debated the inclusion of headings and sub-headings in the draft decision.
Delegates were unable to reach consensus on the preambular text.
A new negotiating text will be drafted, based on submissions by the G-77/CHINA, US, EU, AOSIS and others.
enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
